meta_description: Shop NoBACZ's innovative, antibiotic-free Precision Liquid Bandages. Made with a patented natural polymer, these sustainable dressings form a waterproof barrier on wounds, preventing infections and promoting skin repair. Perfect for dairy farms and hospitals.

Discover a range of healthcare products at NoBACZ Healthcare. Learn more about our company, technology, and contact details. Report product issues, view privacy policies, and access FAQs. Website design by NoBACZ Healthcare.

Protect your farm animals from environmental pathogens with NoBACZ's patented skin seal technology. Antibiotic-free and made from feed grade materials, it provides a durable and waterproof cover for hooves, horn buds, and udders.
Protect your navel with NoBACZ, the eco-friendly solution combining cleansing and a skin seal barrier. No antibiotics needed. Ideal for livestock and horses.
Looking for equine product trial participants? NoBACZ Healthcare offers products for bovine and navel health too. Contact us for more info.

NoBACZ is a company focused on reducing antimicrobial use in human and animal health. Collaborating with universities and industry, they research topics like antibiotic resistance. Contact them for more info.
NoBACZ is committed to reducing antimicrobial use in human and animal health. Collaborating with universities and industry, they research antibiotic resistance. Contact them for more info.
NoBACZ Healthcare: Address, contact info, policies, and more. Get in touch for any questions or concerns. Find the best healthcare solutions.

NoBACZ Healthcare offers a patented platform technology using food or feed additives to create strong, self-degrading 'second skin' barriers. Find out more about our flexible formulations for different patient needs.

NoBACZ Healthcare offers innovative and sustainable healthcare solutions for barrier dressings and bandages, improving animal health and welfare. Contact us for questions and updates on our products and research.
